description:
The Bazecor configurator software allows you to remap any key and create up to 10 fully programmable layers for your Dygma Raise keyboard. It also allows you to create and manage superkeys, macros, and shortcuts.


Hi, Dygmates
This is a quick update to improve the new pop-up to restore your layers after a firmware update.
We've added a way to exit the pop-up if you encounter any issues restoring your backup. That way, you can reconnect your keyboard and restore the backup manually in preferences.
Screenshot 2025-11-28 at 18 10 47
What's New
- Improve restore prompt dialog by @gonza2206 in #1080
Full Changelog: v1.8.2...v1.8.3
